meaning: (n.) taking a class, studying a subject
"in the midst of your work" (cf. お忙しいところ）
feeling obliged; being grateful; being thankful / sorry (prepend a request)
(godan v.) to bring to a finish
(n.) giving and taking; exchanging (eg: letters, conversation)
(godan v.) to reach, to arrive, to get at
(adj.al n.) "at the very least"; lowest, worst; nasty, disgusting, horrible, yuck!
